By creating five large pink crystalline pillars around the user, this technique can be used to enhance the potency of other techniques. It was used to greatly amplify [[Yūkimaru]]'s [[Three-Tails Chakra: Release|ability]] to the point that he could summon the [[Three-Tails]], although with assistance from [[Kabuto]]'s medication.

== Trivia ==
* Even though the technique's name includes "hexagonal", the pillars appear in a ''pentagonal'' formation.
